# Results

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(jsonlite)
library(dplyr)

# Get a list of all .json files in the folder
json_files <- list.files("../benchmark_results/page_identification/", pattern = "\\.json$", full.names = TRUE)

# Initialize an empty dataframe to store results
results_df <- data.frame(
  file_name = character(),
  precision = numeric(),
  recall = numeric(),
  F1 = numeric(),
  runtime_in_s = numeric(),
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE
)

# Loop through each .json file
for (file in json_files) {
  # Read the JSON file
  json_data <- fromJSON(file)
  
  # Extract the required values
  correct_df <- as.data.frame(fromJSON(json_data$correct))
  wrong_df <- as.data.frame(fromJSON(json_data$wrong))
  missing_df <- as.data.frame(fromJSON(json_data$missing))
  
  num_correct <- nrow(correct_df)
  num_wrong <- nrow(wrong_df)
  num_missing <- nrow(missing_df)
  runtime <- round(json_data$runtime, 2)
  precision = round(num_correct/(num_correct+num_wrong),2)
  recall = round(num_correct/(num_correct+num_missing),2)
  F1 = round(2*precision*recall/(precision+recall),2)
  
  # Append the values to the results dataframe
  results_df <- results_df %>%
    add_row(
      file_name = basename(file),
      precision = precision,
      recall = recall,
      F1 = F1,
      runtime_in_s = runtime
    )
}
```
